data.name: BLACK STIGMA
data.detailed_description:
BLACK STIGMA is an action shooter that combines close combat and handgun shooting.
It features a set of unique skills and shooting attributes for masters, which can be used for various tactics.


Key Features

Combination of close combat and handgun shooting
In addition to close combat, players can throw secondary weapons or even utilize dodging skills during the combat.

Building Player's Tactics
BLACK STIGMA features a number of combat support items. By equipping passive skills, players can improve characters' combat performance and further enhance their abilities with booster items. With these support items, even a character with inadequate shooting capabilities may handle firearms that require advanced shooting skills.
Players can implement a variety of playing styles tactically, depending on the combination of their masters and secondary items.

Attractive Game Mode
Bounty Mode, the main game mode of Black Stigma, has unique scoring rules that make the match ever so unpredictable.
Players will have bounties on their heads based on their performance in the game, and scoring points by killing them is the key to winning the match. In the meantime, the targeted players will earn higher points when they kill opponents.
Each team has to use the right strategy at the right time to secure a combat advantage.
